ModMetaData.name: DocWorld
ModMetaData.author: Dr_Zhivago
ModMetaData.description: One of the most ambitious efforts to reorganize RimWorld/Mods into a cleaner, better functioning, and intuitive system. This mod patches, fixes, and adds content to many mods (including but not limited to plain old vanilla RimWorld). Features * New Architect tabs and organizes Architect menu * New drop down menus * Balances recipes for various items * Underground power conduits * Enhances miniaturisation abilities * Increased "stuffable" items * Lights are now more efficient with power usage * Greatly improves inter-mod compatibility [Link to GitHub] https://github.com/DrZhivago1/DocWorld/releases [Link to Ludeon] https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=47165.msg447416#msg447416 [The Doctor's World mod collection] https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1568763074 Credits Alex Il Tabaccaio for the encouragement and helpful additions. Ashnal for the encouragement and helpful additions. Chicken Plucker for the awesome picture of the Doctor. jptrrs for the encouragement and helpful additions. Lanilor for helping me learn xpath patching on the Discord. Mehni for his time and patience on the Discord. NotFood for showing the way of the dragon. RedistHeat the mod, not a person, for cooler textures. ruyanve for the encouragement and helpful additions. Sunlace for hidden conduit idea. Taranchuk for the encouragement and helpful additions. XeoNovaDan for the encouragement and helpful additions. Yehn for helping with xml on the Discord. Architect Textures Smartline, eucalyp, and free pics @ https://www.flaticon.com/ All the beautiful mod creators without whom these patches wouldn't do much.
